name: Nootan Ghimire
body:
[My Personal Website: www.nootan.com.np] (http://www.nootan.com.np/)

### Welcome, folks
Here goes my portfolio. I am a programmer by interest. I code in php and c. Currently a student reding Bachelors in Computer Engineering (Second Semester). I like python too much because of it's beauty! Here are some of my personal links
* [Facebook /nootan.ghimire](http://www.facebook.com/nootan.ghimire)
* [Twitter /nootanghimire](http://www.twitter.com/nootanghimire)
* [Github /nootanghimire](http://www.github.com/nootanghimire)


# oWrite is now Open

"Github for general people" : oWrite is an platform where normal user can write any kind of documents, and collaborate as in github. However, it is still in a concept stage. I've made the code (and the concept) open to all so that people like you can contribute to it and help general people to use it soon!

* [oWrite Github Link](https://www.github.com/nootanghimire/owrite)

The source code and the concept is released on the [DBAD](https://github.com/philsturgeon/dbad) license by [Phil Sturgeon](https://github.com/philsturgeon)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
